name: BHS Testing  - Pittsfield
info:
Located across the hall from Urgent Care. Check-in with staff in atrium. Anyone under age 18 should be accompanied by a parent or guardian. 

Walk-in vaccinations also available from 4pm-7:30pm at Urgent Care.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
